welcome.title: Welcome to Measura!
welcome.description: Let's guide you through the first steps to start using the platform.

managerStep1.title: 1. Create your Organization
managerStep1.description: As a Project Manager or Admin, you can create organizations to group projects and invite team members.

managerStep2.title: 2. Add Projects
managerStep2.description: Create projects to organize work. Projects are required for FPA estimates and measurement plans.

managerStep3.title: 3. Use FPA and Plans
managerStep3.description: Create Function Point Analysis estimates and Measurement Plans for your projects!

userStep1.title: 1. Join an Organization
userStep1.description: Ask your Project Manager or Administrator to invite you to an organization.

userStep2.title: 2. Access Projects
userStep2.description: Once invited, you'll be able to access projects created by your team.

userStep3.title: 3. Create Estimates and Plans
userStep3.description: You can create FPA estimates and measurement plans for existing projects!
